item.title: LeetCode
item.description: LeetCode_每日一题 6-21-1108. IP 地址无效化 难度：简单 模拟 func defangIPaddr(address string) string { return strings.ReplaceAll(address, ".", "[.]") } func defangIPaddr(address string) string { var s strings.Builder for i := range address { if address[i] == '.' { s.WriteString("[.]") } else { s.WriteByte(address[i]) } } return s.String() } 6.13-1051. 高度检查器 难度：简单 模拟 func heightChecker(heights []int) int { n := len(heights) cnt := 0 ars := make([]int, n) copy(ars, heights) sort.
